17.ara-name: كتاب الحدود عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Mu'awiyah:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever drinks wine, then lash him. If he returns to it, then on the fourth time kill him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مَنْ شَرِبَ الْخَمْرَ فَاجْلِدُوهُ وَمَنْ عَادَ فِي الرَّابِعَةِ فَاقْتُلُوهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: Whoever Drinks Wine Then Lash Him, And Whoever Does It A Fourth Time, Then Kill Him
